stark.name: Robb Stark
stark.text: If you win this combat, you may choose the area to which your opponent retreats. You must choose a legal rea where your opponent loses the fewest units.

stark.name: Roose Bolton
stark.text: If you lose this combat, return your entire House card discard pile into your hand (including this card)

stark.name: The Blackfish
stark.text: You do not take casualties in this combat from House card abilities, Combat icons, or Tides of Battle cards.

stark.name: Catelyn Stark
stark.text: If you have a Defence Order token in the embattled area, its value is doubled.

lannister.name: Tywin Lannister
lannister.text: If you win this combat, gain two Power tokens.

lannister.name: Kevan lannister
lannister.text: If you are attacking, all of your participating Footmen (including supporting Lannister footmen) add +2 combat strength instead of +1

lannister.name: Tyrion Lannister
lannister.text: You may immediately cancel your opponent's House card and return it to his hand. He must then choose a different House card to reveal. If he has no other House cards in hand, he cannot use a House card this combat.

lannister.name: Cersei Lannister
lannister.text: If you win this combat, you may remove one of the losing opponent's Order tokens from anywhere on the board.

baratheon.name: Stannis Baratheon
baratheon.text: If your opponent has a higher position on the Iron Throne Influence track than you, this card gains +1 combat strength.

baratheon.name: Renly Baratheon
baratheon.text: If you win this combat, you may upgrade on of your participating Footment (or one supporting Baratheon Footman) to a Knight.

baratheon.name: Ser Davos Seaworth
baratheon.text: If Stannis Baratheon is in your discard pile, this card gains +1 combat strength and a sword icon.

baratheon.name: Salladhor Saan
baratheon.text: If you are being supported in this combat, the combat strength of all non-Baratheon Ships is reduced to 0.

baratheon.name: Patchface
baratheon.text: After combat, you may look at your opponent's hand and discard one card of your choice.

greyjoy.name: Victarion Greyjoy
greyjoy.text: If you are attacking, all of your participating Ships (incl. supporting Greyjoy Ships) add +2 to combat strength instead of +1.

greyjoy.name: Balon Greyjoy
greyjoy.text: The printed combat strength of your opponent's House card is reduced to 0.

greyjoy.name: Theon Greyjoy
greyjoy.text: If you are defending an area that contains either a Stronghold or a Castle, this card gains +1 combat strength, and a sword icon.

greyjoy.name: Asha Greyjoy
greyjoy.text: If you are not being supported in this combat, this card gains two sword icons and one fortification icon.

greyjoy.name: Aeron Damphair
greyjoy.text: You may immediately discard two of your available Power tokens to discard Aeron Damphair and choose a different House Card from your hand (if able).

tyrell.name: Mace Tyrell
tyrell.text: Immediately destroy one of your opponent's attacking or defending Footman units.

tyrell.name: Ser Loras Tyrell
tyrell.text: If you are attacking and win this combat, move the March Order token used into the conquested area. The March Order may be resolved again later this round.

tyrell.name: Queen of Thorns
tyrell.text: Immediately remove one of your opponent's Order tokens in any one area, adjacent to the embattled area. You may not remove the March Order token used to start this combat.

martell.name: Nymeria Sand
martell.text: If you are defending, this card gains a fortification icon. If you are attacking, this card gains a sword icon.

martell.name: Arianne Martell
martell.text: If you are defending and lose this combat, your opponent may not move his units into the embattled area. They return to the area from which they marched. Your own units must still retreat.

martell.name: Doran Martell
martell.text: Immediately move your opponent to the bottom of one Influence track of your choice.
